English: fine ceramics (used for dental implants, synthetic bones, electronics, knife blades etc)

d.f: `用~`碳化~`矽~、`氮~`化~`矽~`等~`高度~`精鍊~`的~`原料~`所~`製造~`成~`的~`陶瓷~。`具有~`不~`導電~、`磁性~、`耐熱~、`超~`高~`硬度~`等~`特性~。`可作~`人造~`牙齒~、`人造~`骨~、`積體電路~`基~`板~、`軸承~`等~`用途~。

English: fine ceramics (used for dental implants, synthetic bones, electronics, knife blades etc)
